flavorText: When Purphoros cleans the ashes from his forge, entire cities vanish.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn Purphoros die Asche aus seiner Schmiede fegt, verschwinden ganze Städte.
foreignData.name: Fegesande
foreignData.text: Die Fegesande fügen jeder Kreatur, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando Purforos limpia las cenizas de su fragua, desaparecen ciudades enteras.
foreignData.name: Arena devastadora
foreignData.text: La Arena devastadora hace 1 punto de daño a cada criatura que controlen tus oponentes. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quand Purphoros nettoie les cendres de sa forge, des villes entières disparaissent.
foreignData.name: Sables purificateurs
foreignData.text: Les Sables purificateurs infligent 1 blessure à chaque créature que vos adversaires contrôlent. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quando Purforos svuota la sua forgia delle ceneri, città intere svaniscono.
foreignData.name: Sabbie Corrosive
foreignData.text: Le Sabbie Corrosive infliggono 1 danno a ogni creatura controllata dai tuoi avversari. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: パーフォロスがその鍛冶場に溜まった灰を掃き去る時、都市もまた消失する。
foreignData.name: 洗い流す砂
foreignData.text: 洗い流す砂はあなたの対戦相手がコントロールする各クリーチャーに、それぞれ１点のダメージを与える。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignData.flavorText: 퍼포로스가 대장간의 재를 청소할 때면 도시가 통채로 사라진다.
foreignData.name: 긁어내는 모래
foreignData.text: 긁어내는 모래는 당신의 상대들이 조종하는 각 생물에 피해 1점을 입힌다. 점술 1. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quando Púrforo limpa as cinzas de sua forja, cidades inteiras desaparecem.
foreignData.name: Areias de Lavagem
foreignData.text: Areias de Lavagem causa 1 ponto de dano a cada criatura que seus oponentes controlam. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.flavorText: Когда Пирфор чистит свою наковальню от пепла, исчезают целые города.
foreignData.name: Шершавые Пески
foreignData.text: Шершавые Пески наносят 1 повреждение каждому существу под контролем ваших оппонентов. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.flavorText: 当普罗烽斯清除锻炉灰烬，整座城市都会给淹没。
foreignData.name: 砂暴扫荡
foreignData.text: 砂暴扫荡向由对手操控的每个生物各造成1点伤害。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.flavorText: 當普羅烽斯清除鍛爐灰燼，整座城市都會給淹沒。
foreignData.name: 砂暴掃蕩
foreignData.text: 砂暴掃蕩向由對手操控的每個生物各造成1點傷害。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

name: Scouring Sands
originalText: Scouring Sands deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

text: Scouring Sands deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
